name: Butterfly Dollhouse
description:
The Butterfly Dollhouse sees the player embodying a child in the mid 2000s playing with a newly discovered dollhouse from generations past. Controlling the child’s beloved doll Vanessa, you explore the dollhouse to solve puzzles and find secrets left behind by their grandmother.

Meet the team!!

Jessica Schembri (she/her): https://www.artstation.com/jessicaschembri | https://sketchfab.com/JessicaSchembriArt
